pages.text: Your pickaxe, which was sinfully expensive to enchant? Almost broken and each additional broken block damages your nerves more than the tool itself.$(br)Even if the tool can't be saved, at least the enchantments will! This canvas does not only capture color: Used on a tool, the enchantments are exchanged.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Once used, an image of the item you used it on will manifest on the canvas, never be removed again, binding it to this type of item.
